DOC.brief_summary: The goal project determine whether prompt recipient health reminder mail ask 4-9 year-old child color reminder could increase engagement target health behavior
DOC.brief_title: The Effect Coloring Prompt Health Engagement
DOC.detailed_description: The investigator randomly assign individual 4-9 year old child receive colorful reminder engage give health behavior . Others receive identical reminder along prompt share reminder sheet child turn piece art . The investigator interest whether color prompt lead reminder stay home longer , place refrigerator , etc . thus result increase compliance recommend health behavior .
DOC.criteria: Indications accord Spring 2011 CDC criterion Pap smear Indications accord Spring 2011 CDC criterion blood pressure check Indications accord Spring 2011 CDC criterion cholesterol test Indications accord Spring 2011 CDC criterion fast plasma glucose test Employee partner corporation implement study
